item.title: Freep
item.description: Stuff I find in the local Detroit “liberal paper”. The detroit Free Press. Here’s a look at the front page from the Free Press 67 years ago on Dec. 30, 1957 ‚Äî the day after the Detroit Lions @detroitlionsnfl won the @NFL title. The Lions famously had only one playoff win since that 1957 title ‚Äî until last season, when they won twice: a 24-23 thriller over the Los Angeles Rams and 31-23 victory over the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.

item.title: Periodic Pics: Threads: Michigan: 12-2024
item.description: Campus Martius Christmas tree@colindetroit Reeling in the New Year, enjoyer style.@michiganenjoyer Happiness is a day with your child.Elijah Jennings plays with his 6-month-old daughter Sade outside the State of Michigan Office Building at Sixth Avenue and Howard in Detroit on August 13, 1987. Scan from Detroit News Collection at the Archives of Michigan. @dcoates315313 Frenchy's Fishing Dock.During an earlier portion of the 1900s, this neon LUNCH sign was at Frenchy’s Fishing Dock, located at the mouth of the Saginaw River (at the end of Shady Shore off of Patterson Road, in Bay County’s Bangor Township).

item.title: Programing tutorials
item.description: These are some tutorials I have run through lately to keep my skill sharp / learn some new stuff during my Convalescence. mariadbtutotial.com mariadbtutotial.com/mariadb basics LazyVim LazyVim is a Neovim setup powered by üí§ lazy.nvim to make it easy to customize and extend your config. Rather than having to choose between starting from scratch or using a pre-made distro, LazyVim offers the best of both worlds - the flexibility to tweak your config as needed, along with the convenience of a pre-configured setup.

item.title: Markdown - Complete Example
item.description: Headers # h1 Heading 8-) ## h2 Heading ### h3 Heading #### h4 Heading ##### h5 Heading ###### h6 Heading Alternatively, for H1 and H2, an underline-ish style: Alt-H1 ====== Alt-H2 ------ h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Alternatively, for H1 and H2, an underline-ish style: Alt-H1 Alt-H2 Emphasis Emphasis, aka italics, with *asterisks* or _underscores_. Strong emphasis, aka bold, with **asterisks** or __underscores__.

item.title: Chromebook
item.description: After years as a dedicated mac person, going back to os9. I have moved over to a Chromebook / Pixel setup for daily driving I saved quite a bit of coin on the new Laptop and have a great Dev environment with Crostini. Chromebook Stats Device: Acer Chromebook 516 GE 16-inch 120Hz QHD+ (2560 x 1600) IPS display Wi-Fi 6E 16 GB, LPDDR4X Intel¬Æ Core‚Ñ¢ i5-1240P processor Dodeca-core 1.70 GHz OS: Google ChromeOS Linux stuff Linux Version: Linux penguin 6.

item.title: Quotes
item.description: This is a place for orphaned quotes. If I collect multiple quotes from a single person, they will be moved to their own post. ‚ÄúI believe that the extraordinary should certainly be pursued. But extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence.‚Äù ‚Äî Carl Sagan, Broca‚Äôs Brain: Reflections on the Romance of Science ‚ÄúReligion is regarded by the common people as true, by the wise as false, and by the rulers as useful.‚Äù
